title: FS: T206 Cobb Bat On SGC 30 and Young Glove Shows PSA 2 = BOTH SOLD!

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb Bat On SGC 30 and Young Glove Shows PSA 2 = BOTH SOLD!
posts.post_content:
A couple of new arrivals today!  Prices should be on par with VCP, and includes shipping with them.

T206 Cobb (Bat On Shoulder) SGC 30 = $1,050 = SOLD!
T206 Young (Glove Shows) PSA 2 = $490 = SOLD!

Thanks for looking!

Jimi
I will take the bat on cobb
